english.browser_does_not_support_websockets: :( Looks like your browser doesn't support WebSockets! To use the Market update to a newer browser, like Google Chrome.
english.cant_connect_to_server: Can't connect to the server. Wait a few minutes and try again.
english.accessing_the_market: Accessing The Market: you need to set a password for Market's web end in-game. You can set a password with /market register <password> Once set, you can log in here with your in-game username and the password you just set.
english.please_log_in: Please log in over here. Once you're logged in you will be able to access Market.
english.there_are_no_listings: There are no listings to show.
english.mail_sent_to_inventory_and_picked_up_ear: Sent to inventory and picked up your earnings of {0}.

response_codes.2: Invalid username or password, please try again.
response_codes.3: You are already logged in somewhere else.
response_codes.6: The server responded with an error, please check the console.
response_codes.9: You can't create or send listings here while you're in-game. Hold an item and type /market create <price> to create while in-game.
response_codes.10: You don't seem to have an inventory, have you joined the server before?
response_codes.11: The requested item could not be found.
response_codes.12: You do not have enough money.
response_codes.16: You are selling too many items.
response_codes.18: You don't have enough of that item.
